holidays.title: National Send a Card to a Friend Day
holidays.description: Do you get excited when you find a hand written card or letter in your mailbox?

holidays.title: African American Coaches Day
holidays.description: Yes, you can! Power a better you on African American Coaches Day.

holidays.title: Ballet Day
holidays.description: We love ballet. Here are several magical reasons we think you’ll appreciate it too.

holidays.title: e-Day
holidays.description: Whip out your TI-84 calculator, and spot the little button that bolsters logarithmic and exponential functions.

holidays.title: Hug an Addict or Alcoholic Day
holidays.description: Help in destigmatizing addiction and rehabilitation and help addicts or alcoholics in their recovery.

holidays.title: Independence Day Grenada
holidays.description: Let’s join together and celebrate the day Grenada became an independent nation.

holidays.title: International Clash Day
holidays.description: Is it surprising that “The Only Band That Matters” has an entire day dedicated to it?

holidays.title: National Black HIV/AIDS Awareness Day
holidays.description: Stories of survivors, and details on the latest innovations in education and treatment of HIV/AIDS

holidays.title: National Fettuccine Alfredo Day
holidays.description: It’s so tasty that it deserves a day all to itself.

holidays.title: National Jack Day
holidays.description: National Today is wishing all the Jacks a happy National Jack Day.

holidays.title: National Periodic Table Day
holidays.description: Pay tribute to the chart in science classrooms that saved us from flunking high school chemistry!

holidays.title: Rose Day
holidays.description: No flower signifies feelings of love and romance like the rose does.

holidays.title: Wave All Your Fingers at Your Neighbor Day
holidays.description: Wave All Your Fingers At Your Neighbor Day fosters friendship among neighbors.

holidays.title: Ashton Kutcher’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this actor-slash venture capitalist, there might not be any feats left to conquer.

holidays.title: BabyFace Ray’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented rapper rose to fame after lots of hard work and perseverance.

holidays.title: Charles Dickens’s Birthday
holidays.description: This renowned novelist can rest in peace knowing his stories are timeless and immortal!

holidays.title: Chris Rock’s Birthday
holidays.description: We celebrate the multi-talented actor and comedian who has made us laugh for many years.

holidays.title: Gabbie Hanna’s Birthday
holidays.description: Nothing seems to deter this multi-talented YouTube star and singer. Celebrate her today!

holidays.title: Garth Brooks’s Birthday
holidays.description: This country and pop musician has nothing left to prove. He is legendary.

holidays.title: Jacksepticeye’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this highly successful YouTuber, gamer, and serial entrepreneur, world domination is in view.

holidays.title: John Deere’s Birthday
holidays.description: This 19th Century founder created a viable legacy that’s still a necessity two centuries later.

holidays.title: Jun Seba’s Birthday
holidays.description: This D.J. shared his gift with the world and left us too soon.

holidays.title: LaToya Forever’s Birthday
holidays.description: This YouTuber and social media influencer has the world in her palms!

holidays.title: Sandra Bland’s Birthday
holidays.description: Due to the experience of this African-American woman, law enforcement is mandated to prioritize mental health.
